PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_StructuralSurfaceMemberVaryingThickness
PropertySetDef.Definition: Thickness parameters of a surface member (structural analysis item) with varying thickness, particularly with linearly varying thickness. The thickness is interpolated/ extrapolated from three points. The locations of these points are given either in local x,y coordinates of the surface member or in global X,Y,Z coordinates. Either way, these points are required to be located within the face or at the bounds of the face of the surface member, and they must not be located on a common line. Local and global coordinates shall not be mixed within the same property set instance.

PropertyDef.Name: Thickness1
PropertyDef.Definition: First thickness parameter of a surface member with varying thickness

PropertyDef.Name: Location1Local
PropertyDef.Definition: Local x,y coordinates of the point in which Thickness1 is given

PropertyDef.Name: Location1Global
PropertyDef.Definition: Global X,Y,Z coordinates of the point in which Thickness1 is given

PropertyDef.Name: Thickness2
PropertyDef.Definition: Second thickness parameter of a surface member with varying thickness

PropertyDef.Name: Location2Local
PropertyDef.Definition: Local x,y coordinates of the point in which Thickness2 is given

PropertyDef.Name: Location2Global
PropertyDef.Definition: Global X,Y,Z coordinates of the point in which Thickness2 is given

PropertyDef.Name: Thickness3
PropertyDef.Definition: Third thickness parameter of a surface member with varying thickness

PropertyDef.Name: Location3Local
PropertyDef.Definition: Local x,y coordinates of the point in which Thickness3 is given

PropertyDef.Name: Location3Global
PropertyDef.Definition: Global X,Y,Z coordinates of the point in which Thickness3 is given
